markdownRemark.html: A museum and interactive science center with 70,000 square meters dedicated to cultural leisure, intelligent entertainment and educational entertainment. Located 15 minutes on foot from the historic center of the city, it receives more than 600,000 visitors a year and has established itself as the most visited museum in Andalusia. There is also a planetarium, an interactive museum, a butterfly park & a viewing tower.

frontmatter.title: Museo Parque de las Ciencias de Granada
frontmatter.description: Museo Parque de las Ciencias de Granada - A museum and interactive science center with 70,000 square meters dedicated to cultural leisure, intelligent entertainment and educational entertainment. Located 15 minutes on foot from the historic center of the city, it receives more than 600,000 visitors a year and has established itself as the most visited museum in Andalusia. There is also a planetarium, an interactive museum, a butterfly park & a viewing tower.
frontmatter.address: Av. de la Ciencia, s/n, 18006 Granada
frontmatter.price: Aduls pay 7.00 euro and children 6.00 euro
tags: Top things to do in Andalusia when it rains
